parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear suspension bumper can cause the suspension to bottom out, leading to metal-to-metal contact, which can result in a sudden failure of the rear suspension at speed, potentially causing a crash and injuries to the rider and others.
symptoms: The rear suspension bumper deteriorates
exposing a spongy-looking material
which flakes away piece by piece
leaving the suspension vulnerable to bottoming out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear struts can cause them to rub against the rear tire, leading to loss of control and potentially causing a crash.
symptoms: The rear struts snap without warning
causing them to rub against the rear tire.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear shock mount can cause the mount to crack or break, leading to a loss of control and potentially causing a crash.
symptoms: The welded point where the shock connects with the bike's frame pulls the shock mounts off
causing them to crack; the mounts turn away from the frame
and the welds break.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty transmission repair can cause the motorcycle to lock up in gear, stall, or not run at all, leading to safety risks and inconvenience to the rider.
symptoms: The motorcycle locks up in 2nd gear
coughs and blows black smoke
dies out while riding
and refuses to run at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unavailability of parts or delays in repair can leave the motorcycle in an unsafe condition, causing inconvenience and frustration to the rider.
symptoms: Long wait times for parts and service
dealerships unable to perform recall work
and riders left without a functioning motorcycle.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Frame Cracking at Rear Shock Mount
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the steel frame at the rear shock mount can cause the motorcycle to become unsafe to ride, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The motorcycle's frame cracks severely at the rear shock mount
the shocks do not respond when riding at low speeds and hitting bumps
rust is observed on the frame.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the kickstand screw can cause the motorcycle to tip over, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The kickstand screw comes out
the motorcycle tips over
the side stand switch screw loosens due to engine heat and does not function properly.
